trans-unit.source: The following users have a password that is found in the top %1$s popular passwords. Please update the password of the found users to a strong password.
No users found with a password matching the top %1$s popular passwords.
This check has never run. Please execute the Symfony Console command - Example: `bin/typo3 pwd_security_check:process %1$s`.
Backend Admin Users with passwords found in the password file
Backend Users with passwords found in the password file
Frontend Users passwords found in the password file
Shows the result of the Password Security Check for TYPO3 Backend and Frontend Users
